message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can adjust in the next round if you'd like.

I'm willing to compromise, but 60/40 is still too much in your favor.  Let's try 70/30.  If we don't reach an agreement soon, the value of the money will continue to drop.
Let's split the money evenly this time.  We're both losing value with each round, so a 50/50 split is the most fair option right now.
